title: Oracle's Larry Ellison is down an unmatched $49 billion this year after the plunge in software stocks
full_text: Oracle's Larry Ellison is down an unmatched $49 billion this year after the plunge in software stocks. Oracle cofounder Larry Ellison's net worth has slumped below $200 billion after his company's stock was caught up in the software sell-off.. Larry Ellison built his wealth by turning Oracle into a dominant enterprise software company.Phillip Faraone/Getty Images <ul><li>Oracle cofounder Larry Ellison has seen an unrivaled $49 billion wip… [+2683 chars]
